Welcome to Daryl's Shoe Store, the best shoe store in the world! 

We sell all kinds of shoes! 

Nike, Adidas, Converse, Manolo Blahnik, Jimmy Choo, Louboutin. 

You name it, we got it!

There are 2 views, the "List" screen and the "Detail" screen. 

You can see the list of available shoes on the "List" screen. 

Add new shoes on the "Detail" screen. 

Once added, you can see the new shoe in the "List" screen. 

Tap the "Next" button below to proceed to the shoe detail screen.
